text.div:
conditionRecordedDateSearchParameter

Parameter recorded-date:date

Searches for condition based on the condition creation date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?recorded-date={date}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: conditionRecordedDateSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the condition creation date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?recorded-date={date}
